decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Location Plan. Received 13/06/2017
284 006 A 017 G; 284 006 A 018 G. Received 08/02/2018
284 006 A 017 G; 284 006 A 018 G. Received 08/01/2018
284 A 018 A; 284 006 A 018; 284 006 A 017. Received 14/12/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The window sills at building known as 12 Woodstock Avenue shall be white (RAL 9010 or similar) and shall remain such thereafter. 
Reason. In order that the Council may be satisfied as to the details of the development in the interests of the visual amenity of the area.

Condition : 4 - No development shall take place until the details and specification of the recreated lintels located over the entrance doors, windows and other openings, as shown on the approved drawings, including those located on the side elevations (where relevant) and detailed 1:20 drawings of the position of aforementioned lintels in relation to the windows, doors and other openings, are submitted and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 5 - The insulated elevations of the buildings known as 39 Dawes Avenue, 40 Dawes Avenue and 49 Dawes Avenue shall be painted in RAL 1002, with exception of the parts covered by lintels, and shall remain such thereafter.
Condition : 6 - The insulated elevations of the buildings known as 19 Woodstock Avenue, 21 Woodstock Avenue and 58 Worple Avenue shall be painted in RAL 1013 and shall remain such thereafter.

Condition : 7 - The insulated elevations of the buildings known 25 Northcote Avenue, 26 Northcote Avenue, 30 Northcote Avenue and 12 Woodstock Avenue shall be painted in RAL 9010 and shall remain such thereafter.
description: Application of external wall insulation to 25, 26, 30 Northcote Avenue, 39, 40, 49 Dawes Avenue, 12, 19, 21 Woodstock Avenue, 58 Worple Avenue
